channel.title: CVE Feed for yonifre -- Maspik – Spam Blacklist
channel.description: The latest CVEs for yonifre -- Maspik – Spam Blacklist

item.title: CVE-2023-24008|2024-08-02T14:47:57.363Z -- yonifre -- maspik%20%E2%80%93%20spam%20blacklist
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in yonifre Maspik – Spam Blacklist plugin <= 0.7.8 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-48272|2024-08-02T21:23:39.482Z -- yonifre -- maspik%20%E2%80%93%20spam%20blacklist
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in yonifre Maspik – Spam Blacklist allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Maspik – Spam Blacklist: from n/a through 0.9.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-25101|2024-06-04T17:35:05.286Z -- yonifre -- maspik%20%E2%80%93%20spam%20blacklist
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in yonifre Maspik – Spam Blacklist allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Maspik – Spam Blacklist: from n/a through 0.10.6.

item.title: CVE-2023-48271|2024-06-04T17:27:30.087Z -- yonifre -- maspik%20%E2%80%93%20spam%20blacklist
item.description: Authentication Bypass by Spoofing vulnerability in yonifre Maspik – Spam blacklist allows Accessing Functionality Not Properly Constrained by ACLs.This issue affects Maspik – Spam blacklist: from n/a through 0.10.3.
